description:
Who says you can't have a decandent dessert while on a hiking adventure: bring this rich and creamy chocolate pudding with cookie crumb crust and toffee peanuts for an extra crunch.

  • Packaging shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you can gauge how much water to add to your meal
  • Just add water, then sprinkle the peanut and chocolate crumb packets over top
  • Ingredients: fructose, cocoa powder (processed with alkali), chocolate pie crumbs [wheat flour, sugar, partially hydrogenated soybean and/or cottonseed oil, cocoa (processed with alkali), salt, sodium bicarbonate], whole milk powder, butter toffee peanuts [sugar, peanuts, butter (cream, milk, salt), salt, vegetable oil, soy lecithin, caramel colour], corn starch, whole egg solids, natural chocolate flavour (chocolate, dextrose, silicon dioxide, tricalcium phosphate), vanilla powder, low sodium salt
  • Allergens - contains: milk, peanuts, wheat, and soy
name: AlpineAire Chocolate Mudslide
